body:
Ye I have been rude lately and spammy, and this might be one of your considered "spammy" posts.

But the problem is communication. I want to talk about what is going on with me and my ban. All I want is to discuss with someone the reasoning ing behind my ban, and I need a form of communication.

Forums-no
email-too long
ts-dont have
djavicus- no one cares

can you help me?

replies.body:
E-mailing is the best way to appeal your ban.
If you think that it takes too much time, then don't complain about it on the forums and just remain banned. If you really want to get unbanned, then you would make an appeal on the forums.

replies.body: Every mod that has spoken here Please tell me how to apply for staff, I mean just where to wright it I really want to.
replies.body_tagged: Every mod that has spoken here Please tell me how to apply for staff, I mean just where to wright it I really want to.

replies.body:
Under "Administration", select "Staff Applications", and create a "New Topic".

There, you may post your staff application.
Good luck.
replies.body_tagged:
Under "Administration", select "Staff Applications", and create a "New Topic".

There, you may post your staff application.
Good luck.
